resources.string: This is a BLE app, it needs permissions to perform BLE scans.
This is a BLE app, it needs permissions to perform BLE scans. You can set this permission by going to the device settings and granting this permission for this app.
This is a BLE app, it needs permissions to connect to BLE devices.
This is a BLE app, it needs permissions to connect to BLE devices. You can set this permission by going to the device settings and granting this permission for this app.
This is a BLE app, Android version 11 and under requires fine location permissions to scan for and connect to BLE devices.

This is a BLE app, Android version 11 and under requires fine location permissions to scan for and connect to BLE devices. You can set this permission by going to the device settings and granting this permission for this app.
This is a BLE app, Android version 11 and under requires coarse location permissions to scan for and connect to BLE devices.

This is a BLE app, Android version 11 and under requires coarse location permissions to scan for and connect to BLE devices. You can set this permission by going to the device settings and granting this permission for this app.
